sub_title: Supply Chain Planning Manager at ASML
summary:
Solid professional experience in Supply Chain either on operational and tactical-strategic levels. Vast knowledge and working experience in areas such as Demand Planning, Supply Planning, Inventory Management and Optimization, Supply Chain Network, Sales and Operations Planning as well as Integrated Business Planning.

Familiar with complex international supply chains, establishment and management of integrated processes with E2E visibility for multi-channel, multi-source, multi-product companies. Experienced on building the required capabilities in supply planning, demand planning and logistics with focus on improve the value chain and customer satisfaction and supply chain processes.

Over 12 years working in multi-cultural environments in FMCG companies for food and beverages industry as well as apparel & fashion operating business in relevant markets such as EU, Africa, Russia and South America. More than one year of experience in the semiconductor industry (high tech, low volume, high value) employed by ASML, the world’s leading provider of lithography systems.

Excellent stakeholder management with relationship building skills, strong social and communication skills demonstrating ability to manage, coach and develop team. Able to consider and analyze different opinions, emphasis on persuasion, ability to influence and take the lead when necessary facilitating the decision making process. Capable to make deep-dive analyses while maintaining high-level overview.

My long term career goal is to continue learning, growing and expanding my professional horizons as well as working experience worldwide. Timely execution and result driven, innovation minded, job done mentality and motivated person I know how to set goals and achieve them.

contributors.headline: Supply Chain Planning Manager at ASML
Team Member Commerce at Partners Network BV at Partners Network - Global Distributor

profile_positions.description: Responsible for integral supply chain plan for the most critical parts. Active role in driving decision making process towards senior management with a network of multiple interfaces in the organization being on top of the supply chain performance. Secure that the agreed plans are reflected in the applicable tools for strategic planning and operational execution driving containment actions in case of deviations between supply and demand. As team lead I motivate and influence highly educated professionals to maximize their potential.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain Planning Team Lead Critical Parts Planning

profile_positions.description:
Later, responsible to ensure Optics for new systems, field upgrades and service. Assess and develop product planning processes that improves material availability within integral cycle time. Manage cross-sector interface through the ISCP (Integral Supply Capability Plan) review capacities process matching capacity utilization with demand building a feasible and agreed master production plan.

After 1 year, became responsible for planning XT systems, part of the DUV portfolio, with the goal to optimally meet customer demand.

Initially, responsible to ensure that the planning for critical parts used in system starts, upgrades in the field as well as customer support are in place and transparent at all times to achieve excellent customer service at all levels of the organization.
